title: (x) Large bold sans and slab serifs -- need ID - H&FJ Tungsten, H&FJ Vitesse {Akira, Simon R}
content:
Can anyone identify the large sans and slab serifs in this layout?

And is "THE COUNTRY" in the same typeface, or is it something else?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Magazine\_spread-2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108102614/http:/typophile.com/files/Magazine_spread-2.jpg) | 206.96 KB |
author: luvtype

comments.content: Thanks! I was hoping it was something else. What comes close to Vitesse?
The condensed sans looks like H&FJ Tungsten...
I wonder when a sans will be available...
